Description.Text: All rooms on the ground floor have garden view and 11 of the rooms in the first floor have pool view. Every room has its private balcony or a veranda. Eight rooms have shower and the rest have a bathtub, all bathrooms are completely renovated in 2006.The two apartments are situated in the Bungalow complex of the Kalypso Hotel. They have two floors with a balcony and a small hall with a kitchenette on the ground floor. Both have two bedrooms, one balcony and one veranda, a kitchenette with a fridge, tub and cooking facilities. Each apartment has one bathroom and two WC

Hotel is located in the north-eastern part of Crete, on the beach road between Malia and Stalis. A region known for its great variety of landscapes, with the Dikti Mountains in the south and its famous white sandy beaches. The hotel is located at a 30 minutes drive from the airport and 32 km from Heraklion and Knossos, both connected by the new motorway leading to Ag. Nikolaos. A GPA accredited 18-hole golf course is in only 10 km distance.Shopping, Night Life, leisure as well as Food & Beverages are at locality or walking distances.
